name: UNNotificationCategory
desc: A type of notification your app supports and the custom actions that the system displays.

items.name: init(identifier: String, actions: [UNNotificationAction], intentIdentifiers: [String], options: UNNotificationCategoryOptions)
items.desc: Creates a category object containing the specified actions and options.

items.name: init(identifier: String, actions: [UNNotificationAction], intentIdentifiers: [String], hiddenPreviewsBodyPlaceholder: String, options: UNNotificationCategoryOptions)
items.desc: Creates a category object containing the specified actions, options, and placeholder text used when previews aren’t shown.

items.name: init(identifier: String, actions: [UNNotificationAction], intentIdentifiers: [String], hiddenPreviewsBodyPlaceholder: String?, categorySummaryFormat: String?, options: UNNotificationCategoryOptions)
items.desc: Creates a category object containing the specified actions, options, placeholder text used when previews aren’t shown, and summary format string.

items.name: var identifier: String
items.desc: The unique string assigned to the category.

items.name: var actions: [UNNotificationAction]
items.desc: The actions to display when the system delivers notifications of this type.

items.name: var intentIdentifiers: [String]
items.desc: The intents related to notifications of this category.

items.name: var hiddenPreviewsBodyPlaceholder: String
items.desc: The placeholder text to display when the system disables notification previews for the app.

items.name: var categorySummaryFormat: String
items.desc: A format string for the summary description used when the system groups the category’s notifications.

items.name: var options: UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Options for how to handle notifications of this type.

items.name: struct UNNotificationCategoryOptions
items.desc: Constants indicating how to handle notifications associated with this category.
